Almost 3000 dead in Iraq, that's savage and this is the modern age. Back then it was about survival and at least it was real warfare hand to hand combat and such, not this pussyshit long range nuclear warheads, armored vehicles and shit. I'm talking about knives, arrows, spears, and straight up martial arts. Too bad people like you are out there mischaracterizing our culture.
